overview:
CodeMyIMAGE is a Massachusetts based company which provides PSD to XHTML conversion services to web designers and advertising and branding agencies. This company was created for the people who would like to focus more on their passion, creating more unique and creative designs.

PSD to HTML:

CodeMyIMAGE was started to provide web designers and branding and advertising agencies with fast, high quality, PSD to HTML services. We’ve created an optimized service to provide you with CSS/HTML pages that can also be integrated into popular CMS and e-commerce systems. In addition, CodeMyIMAGE is unique to provide personal assistance in order to implement changes and adjustments, after the project has been delivered. CodeMyIMAGE also meets industry standards creating W3C valid code and ADA compliant websites.

CMS Integration:

Business imperatives have created the need for tools which allow non-technical users to maintain their own site. Content management systems or CMSs are the answer to this need. With a properly programmed CMS, non-technical users can make website updates with little training. CodeMyIMAGE will assist you, whether you want to create a new website or upgrade your existing one. You can choose among the best CMS tools, according to your needs, or we can help recommend one.

CMS Hosting:

All of our dedicated solutions are designed specifically for CMS powered websites, and offer an extremely reliable and redundant environment with ample bandwidth, disk space and monitoring. You can choose among the best CMS tools, according to your needs.

With more than 400 million active users worldwide, Facebook has become a force to be reckoned with in matters of leading edge marketing and PR activity. A custom page functions as a profile that can be seen both by fans and other Facebook users. CodeMyIMAGE codes custom Facebook pages! Basically, we can do anything it takes to connect a brand with its target audience. Just tell us what your customers need, and weâ€™ll integrate your creation into a top-notch Facebook fan page!
